titleStmt.title: Athravaeth Gristnogavl, ḷe cair ụedi cynnụys yn grynno'r hoḷ brifbynciau syḍ i gyfarụyḍo dyn ar y phorḍ i baradụys..
titleStmt.author: Clynnog, Morys, ca. 1521-1581.
Robert, Gruffydd, ca. 1522-ca. 1610, ed.

publicationStmt.date: 1568. dyụgụyl. S. Nicolas [i.e. feast of St. Nicholas, 6 Dec.].

notesStmt.note: Imprint information from colophon; actual place and publisher from STC (2nd ed.).
Edited, with preface and appendix, by Griffith Roberts.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
